title: Opening file reports ingestion but grid stays empty
Enhance TagNoteDialog for label selection
Add error handling tests for malformed CSV, worker failures, and OPFS permission denials
Persist byte-offset row index in OPFS
description: Store checkpointed row offsets to OPFS for random access per TDD §7.3.

title: If we right-click on a column of the header row, it should provide a context menu with the option to hide the whole column
Implement type inference for streaming batches
description: Infer column types from sampled rows and surface metadata per TDD §7.2.

title: Expand ingestion batch size
Build filter expression engine
description: Implement worker-side AST evaluation for column predicates per TDD §7.4.

title: Clarify scope of annotation export
description: TDD §16 flags an open product question: should tag/note exports honour the active filter or always include the full annotation set? Capture the decision (and update UX copy) before implementing the export flow.

title: Add script to run Caddy in current directory
Validate annotation UX direction
description: TDD §16 notes a pending decision on side panel vs inline annotation editing. Once the tagging UI lands we should run analyst feedback, document the choice, and adjust the design system accordingly.

title: On the top bar, near the Options button, add a Columns button that will list all columns displayed or not displayed with a checkbox
Implement progressive sorting optimization for large datasets
description: Implemented progressive sorting optimization: for datasets >50K rows, sort first 2000 rows immediately for instant UI feedback, then sort remaining rows in background. Added progressive sorting API, background promise handling, and automatic detection of large datasets in DataGrid.

title: Revert 100k batch size
M1 — Parser Prototype
description: Deliver stream-based CSV/TSV ingestion in worker and connect to virtualized grid per PRD §10 M1 and TDD §§7.1-7.3.

title: Build tagging and note UI
description: Provide tag palette controls and markdown editor slide-over per PRD §4.4 and TDD §9.

title: Expose status bar metrics
description: Per TDD §9 the footer should surface real-time rows parsed, active filter info, and memory usage estimates from the worker. Today App.tsx only renders a text string with total rows; no worker telemetry is surfaced. Add a structured status bar component that ingests worker stats (rows parsed, matched rows, memory estimate) and displays filter/search context.

title: Add codex-cli-nix flake input
Benchmark row index checkpoint interval
description: TDD §16 lists an open follow-up to decide between 10k vs 50k row checkpoints for the OPFS row index. Add a benchmarking script that loads representative datasets, measures seek latency + storage footprint, and recommend a default interval.

title: Set up unit and worker test harness
description: Configure Vitest for parser, type inference, and worker integration per TDD §13.

title: Export and import annotations
description: Support JSON export/import of tag and note metadata per PRD §4.7.

title: Expand filterExpression unit tests to cover multiple filters, operators, fuzzy flags, and invalid inputs
Add beads to flake environment
Implement logic to hide columns that contain only null values by default
Toggle filters on/off
description: Add a checkbox next to each filter to temporarily disable it without deleting, ensuring disabled filters are ignored in expressions, summaries, and counts.

title: M6 — Persistence & Polish
description: Finalize OPFS sessions, capability gating, and UX polish per PRD §10 M6 and TDD §§7.6,10,11.

title: Expose pivot UI for grouped results
description: Add grid pivot view and controls for grouping summaries per PRD §4.5 and TDD §9.

title: Add timestamps to ingestion debug logs
Add ingestion performance debug logging
Right-click filter context menu
Show row count per active filter
description: For each applied filter, display how many rows it currently matches so users understand the filter impact immediately.

title: Build trigram index for fuzzy search
description: Generate per-column 3-gram dictionaries and cache in OPFS per TDD §7.6.

title: Implement streaming CSV/TSV parser worker
description: Build the data worker pipeline using Streams API, TextDecoder, and batch emission per TDD §7.1.

title: Wire filter engine into worker streaming pipeline
Support .csv.gz ingestion
description: The open-file flow only accepts .csv/.tsv and the data worker never wraps File.stream() with DecompressionStream, so compressed timelines called out in PRD §4.1 (.csv.gz/.tsv.gz) fail to load. We need to negotiate gzip detection, pipe through the compression API, and update the picker + parser tests accordingly.

title: Integrate DuckDB-WASM fallback
description: Load optional DuckDB-WASM path for complex grouping/filter cases per TDD §§3.1,7.5.

title: Implement worker-side grouping aggregates
description: Add hash-map aggregation for counts/sum/min/max per TDD §7.5.

title: Bundle DuckDB-WASM assets
Surface filter builder UI
description: Create predicate builder UI with fuzzy toggle and hook into worker RPC per PRD §4.3 and TDD §9.

title: Set up CI pipeline with lint and tests
description: Add pnpm scripts and CI workflow to run lint, unit, and e2e checks per TDD §14.

title: Add time window filter option in datetime context menu
description: When right-clicking a datetime value in the grid, add a new menu entry 'Filter time window around this value'. This opens a modal dialog with two inputs: 1) Time window range (numeric input), 2) Time unit (dropdown: days/hours/minutes). The filter should create a between predicate for [selected_time - range, selected_time + range] using the chosen unit.

title: Add global search across visible columns
description: Provide main-thread search bar delegating to worker scan per PRD §4.3.

title: Author Playwright end-to-end tests
description: Automate Chromium scenarios for load, filter, tagging, persistence per TDD §13.

title: Integrate axe-core accessibility checks
description: TDD §13 calls for accessibility audits with axe-core to verify keyboard navigation and contrast. We do not have any automated a11y coverage in the tests or dev tooling. Add axe-core (or @axe-core/react) integration to the test suite and document manual audit workflow.

title: Add capability gating for Chromium APIs
description: Detect File System Access, Streams, and OPFS support and block unsupported browsers per TDD §§3.1,11.

title: Profile fuzzy search contention
description: TDD §16 suggests we may need a dedicated worker for fuzzy search if contention shows up. After implementing the fuzzy pipeline, collect perf traces (parse + fuzzy in parallel) and decide whether to spin a separate worker.

title: Disable beads Go tests in flake
Implement auto-save scheduler and storage limits
description: Run periodic session snapshots with LRU cleanup for OPFS quotas per TDD §8.2.

title: Enhance component tests with better mocking of dependencies like AG Grid APIs
Persist fuzzy index artifacts to OPFS
description: TDD §§7.6,8.2 call for caching trigram dictionaries and token metadata under /indexes/fuzzy_index.json so fuzzy fallback does not rebuild on every launch. The current worker has no persistence story—no OPFS writes/reads tied to the search pipeline. Implement OPFS storage for the trigram + token dictionaries and wire hydration at load time.

title: Add e2e tests with Playwright for file load, filter interactions, tagging, session restore, export flows
Implement sorting UI controls in DataGrid
description: Implement sorting UI controls with ag-Grid integration. Column headers should show sort arrows and support single/multi-column sorting. Connect to existing useSortSync hooks and session store for persistence.

title: Design tagging data model and workflows
notes: Documented the tagging data model, worker contract, OPFS persistence plan, and UI workflows in docs/tagging-workflows.md. This covers label/tag schemas, flush scheduling, and export/import flows so implementation tasks (csv-explorer-bd68, csv-explorer-8ad2) can follow the contract.

title: Stream rows to grid before ingestion completes
Persist tags and notes in OPFS
description: Store annotation map under /annotations with atomic writes per TDD §§7.7,8.2.

title: Fix filterExpression.test.ts TypeScript errors related to FilterNode/FilterExpression types
notes: Fixed TypeScript errors in filterExpression.test.ts by casting FilterNode to FilterPredicate where appropriate

title: Integrate tags/notes with session persistence
M5 — Fuzzy Search
description: Ship typo-tolerant filtering path with UI toggles per PRD §10 M5 and TDD §7.6.

title: Sanitize annotation markdown output
description: TDD §12 requires sanitising markdown notes with DOMPurify when rendering. The tagging pipeline (LabelsPanel, upcoming annotation view) does not import any sanitizer today, so once notes are rendered we risk XSS. Add DOMPurify (or equivalent) on the render path and cover it with tests.

title: During ingestion, guess min/max datetime values to limit datetime picker range
Auto-load tags on file load to populate DataGrid tag column
Fix bd build in nix develop
M3 — Grouping & DuckDB
description: Deliver grouping UI and optional DuckDB-WASM integration per PRD §10 M3 and TDD §7.5.
notes: Filter sidebar now defaults to collapsed state to add horizontal room for grid.

title: Implement multi-column sort pipeline
description: Add worker-side sorting keyed on typed values with UI controls per TDD §7.4.

title: M2 — Filtering & Sorting
description: Implement worker-side filter and sort engine with UI controls as outlined in PRD §10 M2 and TDD §§7.4-7.5.

title: Decide DuckDB vs native path for complex filters
description: TDD §16 calls out an open decision about when to route filters through DuckDB instead of the JS engine. We should profile representative datasets, document thresholds, and codify heuristics in shouldPreferDuckDb().

title: Implement datetime picker for start_time and end_time selection
Create performance benchmarking harness
description: Generate synthetic 2 GB dataset and script parse/filter metrics per TDD §13.

title: Investigate test suite hanging
Add Export Tags UI in top bar
Stop retaining entire dataset in memory after load
description: The worker (src/workers/dataWorker.worker.ts) pushes every parsed row into the long-lived state.dataset.rows array, and the UI store (src/state/dataStore.ts) mirrors that into rows. For multi-GB timelines this duplicates the dataset in memory and violates the 600 MB budget noted in TDD §§7.1 and 10. We need to switch to windowed storage (recycle parsed batches, request by index) so we actually stream instead of retaining the full file.

title: Load row index from OPFS and support seek
Implement Damerau-Levenshtein scoring path
description: Add distance scoring with early exit thresholds per PRD §3.3.a and TDD §7.6.

title: Add an Export function that will select all visible rows for the user to download
Scaffold labels UI and worker API
notes:
Scaffolding complete: 
- Worker now exposes tagRows/clearTag/updateLabel/deleteLabel/export/import stubs with in-memory state.
- Added TagStore Zustand slice with load/apply/clear/import/export helpers.
- Introduced Labels panel and top-bar entry alongside Columns; dialog lists labels and placeholder create/delete.
- Context + state ready for full tagging implementation to plug into UI.
Pending: implement real persistence, grid decorations, and bulk workflows per design.

title: Case sensitivity controls for filters and search
Test and polish tagging/note features
Reduce per-character async overhead in CSV parser
M4 — Tagging & Notes
description: Implement tagging and markdown annotations with OPFS persistence per PRD §10 M4 and TDD §§7.7-8.

title: Fix npm test failures
Auto-resize column widths to cover 80% of row content
Add matches/not matches regex filters
The left side panel that shows all  filters should have  a toggle to collapse/expand it
Implement global search RPC and UI
Export filtered results and annotations
description: Allow CSV/CSV.GZ export of filtered/grouped data plus tag JSON per PRD §4.7 and TDD §7.7.

title: Design fuzzy fallback UI/UX
description: Show no-match banner, distance chips, and toggle per PRD §3.3.a and TDD §9.

title: Fix npm build failure
Add options panel with font selector
Render streamed data in virtualized grid
description: Wire AG Grid (or equivalent) to worker row batches with pagination per TDD §5.2 and §7.1.

title: Implement error handling and diagnostics
description: Surface worker and OPFS failures with retry/backoff and diagnostic download per TDD §11.

title: Implement worker integration tests for streaming parse and filter combinations
Implement datetime type guessing and ISO display
Persist and restore session state
description: Save layout, filters, and file handles to OPFS and hydrate on launch per PRD §4.6 and TDD §§7.6,8.2.

title: Add performance instrumentation and guardrails
description: Instrument parse/filter/fuzzy stages with performance.mark and memory estimates per TDD §10.

title: Add performance tests for large datasets to validate benchmarks
Add Import Tags UI in LabelsPanel
Integrate test coverage reporting with Vitest and target >80% coverage
Fix DataGrid.test.tsx TypeScript errors related to ag-grid mocking
notes: Fixed TypeScript errors in DataGrid.test.tsx by updating mock to match ICellRendererParams interface and simplifying render calls
